title: BoreholeInterval
description: A <font color="#4f81bd">BoreholeInterval</font> is similar to a <font color="#4f81bd">MappedFeature</font>  whose shape is 1-D interval and uses the SRS of the containing borehole.  The "<font color="#4f81bd">mappedIntervalBegin</font>" and "<font color="#4f81bd">mappedIntervalEnd</font>" properties are alternative to the 1D geometry to overcome problems with the delivery and ease of queryability of 1D GML shapes.

observationMethod-1.title: observationMethod
observationMethod-1.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">observationMethod property</font> <font color="#4f81bd">(SWE::Category</font>) contains a term from a controlled vocabulary that describes the method used to observe the properties of the borehole.

observationMethod-2.title: observationMethod
observationMethod-2.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">observationMethod property</font> <font color="#4f81bd">(SWE::Category</font>) contains a term from a controlled vocabulary that describes the method used to observe the properties of the borehole.

observationMethod-3.title: observationMethod
observationMethod-3.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">observationMethod property</font> <font color="#4f81bd">(SWE::Category</font>) contains a term from a controlled vocabulary that describes the method used to observe the properties of the borehole.

specification.title: specification
specification.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">specification</font> property is an association between a <font color="#4f81bd">BoreholeInterval</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">GFI_Feature</font>, a domain feature that is sampled by the interval (e.g., a <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnit</font>). It is semantically equivalent to O&M ISO19156 "<font color="#4f81bd">sampledFeature</font>".

mappedIntervalBegin.title: mappedIntervalBegin
mappedIntervalBegin.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">mappedIntervalBegin</font> (<font color="#4f81bd">SWE::Quantity</font>) is a measurement (a value and a unit of measurement) corresponding to the measured distance of the start of the mapped interval along the path of the borehole. The measured value must be less than or equal to the <font color="#4f81bd">mappedIntervalEnd</font> value.

mappedIntervalEnd.title: mappedIntervalEnd
mappedIntervalEnd.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">mappedIntervalEnd</font> property (<font color="#4f81bd">SWE::Quantity</font>) is a measurement (a value and a unit of measure) corresponding to the measured distance of the end of the mapped interval along the path of the borehole. The measured value must be greater than or equal to the <font color="#4f81bd">mappedIntervalBegin</font> value.

collectionIdentifier.title: collectionIdentifier
collectionIdentifier.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">collectionIdentifier:ScopedName</font> is a string unique within a scope that identifies a collection which forms a set <font color="#4f81bd">BoreholeIntervals</font>. This allows description of multiple downhole logs for a single borehole. The name should identify a particular log observation event.

parentBorehole.title: parentBorehole
parentBorehole.description: The property parentBorehole is an association between a BoreholeInterval and a Borehole to which the interval belongs.
